Battery + Virtual Powerplant

How does AGL's
Virtual Power Plant work?

With a battery at your home you can store energy from your solar panels to use later, saving on your power bills and giving you a backup in a blackout. Usually your battery only benefits you, but signing up in to Virtual Power Plant unlocks the possibility of exporting your battery power to the grid.

Energy for the community

Be your community’s energy hero.

With your help you can help power your state when it’s too warm or cold, and help stabilise the grid and support your community when the grid needs a helping hand.

Flexibility

Opt in or out of VPP events.

With your help you can help power your state when it’s too warm or cold, and help stabilise the grid and support your community when the grid needs a helping hand.

Optimise battery usage with real-time insights on the AGL mobile app.
